com.facebook.react.uimanager

接口 ViewManagerDelegate<T extends android.view.View>

  • 类型参数:
    T - the type of the view supported by this delegate
    所有已知实现类:
    ActivityIndicatorViewManagerDelegate, AndroidDialogPickerManagerDelegate, AndroidDrawerLayoutManagerDelegate, AndroidDropdownPickerManagerDelegate, AndroidProgressBarManagerDelegate, AndroidSwipeRefreshLayoutManagerDelegate, AndroidSwitchManagerDelegate, AndroidViewPagerManagerDelegate, BaseViewManagerDelegate, InputAccessoryViewManagerDelegate, MaskedViewManagerDelegate, ModalHostViewManagerDelegate, ProgressViewManagerDelegate, PullToRefreshViewManagerDelegate, SafeAreaViewManagerDelegate, SegmentedControlManagerDelegate, SliderManagerDelegate, SwitchManagerDelegate, UnimplementedNativeViewManagerDelegate

    public interface ViewManagerDelegate<T extends android.view.View>
    This is an interface that must be implemented by classes that wish to take over the responsibility of setting properties of all views managed by the view manager.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void setProperty(T view, java.lang.String propName, java.lang.Object value) 

    • 方法详细资料

      • setProperty

                 java.lang.String propName,
                 java.lang.Object value)
